website_summaries.verdict: A soft portion-controllable snack made with real meat and without grains or poultry by-product fillers.
pros: Moist, soft, and meaty treats most dogs devour
Easy to break and share, so good for multi-dog homes
Made with real fruit and veggies — no soy, corn, or wheat
cons: Large breeds may need a bigger treat to be satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like these treats and I like that they are healthy but my dogs are not as fond of these as they are of some of the other treats I offer. These treats are ok for housebreaking or easy training sessions but if I need my dogs to work hard or work with distractions around, these treats are not enough to keep them focused. I am a dog trainer so I need treats that are loved by many dogs, even picky ones and also are small and lower calorie. These are the perfect size and the calories aren't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes this product almost all the time.
customer_reviews.text: My dog, Graham, likes this product almost all the time. Graham is a picky eater. There are treats other dog owners offer him and he won't go beyond smelling them. Graham might refuse Blue Stix Lamb and Apple for weeks, once or twice per year. The rest of the time, he wants it every day. He'll stand on my foot or bump my leg with his nose until he gets his morning treat.
customer_reviews.author: Don Winfield

customer_reviews.title: ... Chihuahuas and was really hoping this one they would like since it's "Blue" like the dry kibble they eat ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of different treats for my picky little Chihuahuas and was really hoping this one they would like since it's "Blue" like the dry kibble they eat but they weren't to thrilled with these jerkys as they are other jerky brands. Also too expensive for such a tiny bag. I'm not a cheap person. I have spent 27$ on one bag of jerky and buy greenies by the loads. I just hoped if they selling an expensive treat it has flavor the dogs like. I sent them to my daughters little dog who isn't as spolied as mine and he ate them but wasn't fond either.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet J.

customer_reviews.title: MaggieLou's favorite food bar none
customer_reviews.text: Lil' MaggieLou is a happy girl when we have our Jerky Joints. I put two sticks a day into her food, treats and training time. She loves these so much she won't eat her food unless there is some broken up bits in there. She's been enjoying these for 2 years now. She is a 25-lb. girl with short Bichon legs and a Poodle face and shape. And then there is the huge behind that we think came from a Doxie grandparent. Either way she is adorable. And I strive to protect her joint and hip health.
customer_reviews.author: Magster's mommie

customer_reviews.title: Lamb and apple sticks for the win!!
customer_reviews.text: My rescue pup is very picky and has some food issues, most likely from the people he lived with before we adopted him. He absolutely loves these Lamb and Apple sticks! We call them "sheep sticks" and when we ask him if he wants one he prances right over to where we keep them. He likes them so much I ordered a few extra bags to keep around. I ordered some of the little salmon treats as well. Hopefully he likes those too. If not, the Merrick Salmon Power Bites are a big thumbs up if you have a picky pup also!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew and Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It's gone!
customer_reviews.text: This product always met my highest expectations. When Blue Buffalo quit making this, I was a little more than upset. Trying to find a product similar has been a problem. My boys are pretty picky when it comes to their food and treats.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these—I've yet to try them
customer_reviews.text: Dog seems to enjoy them, but I can't say how good they are from personal experience. Tear each one in half for a little treat (dog's 60 lbs, so maybe I should give her a whole one) whenever we leave the house. Our dog sometimes gets snobby about some of the other treats we have, but this she always eats.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Moser

customer_reviews.title: Quality Treats
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the best treats I've bought for my pekingnese. Now that he's gotten older (13 yrs old), he was having difficulty moving around. The Vet suggested we try Glucosamine pills. It was difficult getting him to swallow the pills. This is great way to getting Glucosamine and Chondroitin for his joints and he loves the chicken. We go through about 2 bags a month. I wish they came in bigger bags and it's a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn_Mama

customer_reviews.title: My dogs favorite
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when you buy this product. That sold by amazon.com LLC has 4 bags in the order. This same product is also sold by Primette and fulfilled by Amazon. It appears to be for only one bag at $10.99. You may want to question what is in the order. I reordered by going to my past purchases and selecting there. My dog loves these and he is rather picky. He is on his 4th bag and I have an order coming soon. The bag states that these are made from farm raised chicken in USA, not chicken by-products. It contains glucosamine condroitin. It is manufactured in U.S.A.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ward

customer_reviews.title: We love this snack.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 min pins and this breed often struggles with a dry skin condition. Keeping them on one food and one treat helps reduce any flare ups. These are 6 inch sticks so we cut each stick in fourths. Great snack.
customer_reviews.author: C L Mann

customer_reviews.title: No stink
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant because most meaty dog treats have a overpowering "stink". These have hardly any, if at all. My corgi is about 28 pounds, luckily not a picky eater. These are a good size and shape for him, no choking despite hardly chewing his food, ever lol. Enjoyed them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Really Works, thank God!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dog treat for our new dog who didn't seem to know the meaning of sleep. Sadly, we were becoming as sleep deprived as a couple who had just arrived home with a new baby. The jerky actually works, since giving him a few pieces just before bedtime every night everyone, including Winston, has enjoyed a peaceful nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Meek

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday treats for my Frenchie!
customer_reviews.text: My French Bulldog loves these. They are the primary treat I give him to help motivate him to get in his crate, go to bed, walk next to me, etc. I've been feeding him these treats for about 8 months now (since he was 3 months old) and he hasn't tired of them yet. I especially like the notches where you can easily break them off into smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Did not affect my dog
customer_reviews.text: Don't really feel like these helped my dog calm down at all. I feel like you like them well enough, but they were pretty hard and chewy, so I would have to break them up into little pieces before I would give them to him ( and he's a big dog). I even tried to give him two or three at a time, still no difference. Still, I give it three stars for the all natural factor and the fact he seem to still like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Best dog training treats EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Even my finicky pup adores these Beef & Potato dog treats!! If you tear them into bite-size morsels, they make the best training treats! If you choose to give your dog a whole stick, then I suggest tearing it in half and presenting the torn ends to your dog so they can smell how yummy it is. It's very important to remember to reseal the bag completely so they don't dry out or go bad ( and so the dog won't help themselves to it ).
customer_reviews.author: Don Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My border collie LOVES these----I think he'd eat the whole pouch in one go if I'd let him. He's a big time real salmon lover and he'll go for these too. I like that they're soft so he's getting a variety of textures, not always just crunchy biscuits. If I put out a variety of treats to choose from, he'll pick these first (or any other salmon flavored ones, except the Plato's which he hated and wouldn't even try) every time. I just wish they came in a bigger amount!
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: My dog is obsessed with these. I've gotten them ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is obsessed with these. I've gotten them from the store before, and there cheaper here on Amazon, so I figured why not. But, anyways, every time I buy the Blue Sticks, my dog can sniff them from a mile away and comes running as soon as I open the package. And the last time, somehow my dog ended up getting the package off the counter, ripping it apart, and eating the last 2 sticks left. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love these treats and Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loves these treats. He tends to like treats which are soft and chewy and for the price you can't be it. He is a little dog about 15 pounds so the bag lasts a while. I only buy treats in the US. Keeps American's working and too many horror stories about dog food coming from China.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: Pit mix loves them
customer_reviews.text: Out pit mix loves these. Anything Blue Buffalo really...We put these into puzzle toys so she has to work at them to get little bits of these out. Easy to break apart to make smaller treats too. Very soft and lots of flavors to choose from. Great for use in Kong or West Paw type toys.
customer_reviews.author: Walk About

customer_reviews.title: We have a very finicky rat terrier Who basically like she's a little bit isn't people food
customer_reviews.text: We have a very finicky rat terrier who basically likes anything other than people food. However, she loves this dog treat ! They come in a 6 inch soft stick that are perforated so you can easily tear off smaller pieces for little dogs. Amazon Add-On price beats all others and makes these treats very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: HopAlong

customer_reviews.title: Great treat. Package damage.
customer_reviews.text: Hi ok here's the deal. These treats are a life saver when it comes to puppies who are energetic around bedtime...when they don't arrive with the bag punctured and as hard as a Popsicle stick. The first time we ordered these they were fine. We were just delivered our 2nd bag and they were damaged ;-; what am I supposed to do about this rambunctious puppy whose asleep as I wrote this so only God knows how hyper he may be. But other than that, lovely.
customer_reviews.author: TLP

customer_reviews.title: The treats smell like nothing pleasurable or edible
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua is picky. She adores all the u healthy treats: Milos kitchen meatballs, beggin bacon treats... So I'm trying to give her more healthy treats. She'll play with them and eventually eat them, but she's not crazy about them. The treats smell like nothing pleasurable or edible ... and they're some wha dry? Not sure if that's normal or tasteful for dogs. But the treat is soft to break into pieces.
customer_reviews.author: LUCLUTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect size and composition when you need a slightly larger, long lasting treat - like when it's time to reward your dog for going into his crate at your mealtime....
customer_reviews.author: DRGATB

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua approved!
customer_reviews.text: My three chihuahuas loves these. They came in a sealable bag and were nice and soft which my pups prefer over hard treats. Got these at a discount, otherwise they’re a little pricey for a three dog family. Would definitely buy again if I could find them a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for people who carry treats with them for training ...
customer_reviews.text: Never mind my view, let me tell you that our dog loves these thin sticks. Made from ingredients that make his humans want to eat them too. They are perfect for people who carry treats with them for training aids or just for dog refreshment b/c they are so firm that they don't crumble. Also, since they are soft, they can be broken into any size you want to fit your dog's size, appetite or the occasion. Max gives them 5 tail wags.
customer_reviews.author: only the rain

customer_reviews.title: my min pin loves these treats and we buy on a regular basis. they are soft and small and perfect for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: my min pin loves these treats and we buy on a regular basis. they are soft and small and perfect for small dogs. they are mad ei the usa and don't have extra chemicals or by-products like other treats that can be harmful for dogs. don't feed more than recommended as they will make your dog very thirsty
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Dogs need to go to rehab after these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs went absolutely bananas/crazy for these. They literally got addicted and wouldn't eat any other treats. They ran to the kitchen where the treats were every 5 minutes to see if they could score another one... I started fearing for their ability to function without them. Unfortunately, because of this, and because these treats are so expensive and you don't get much per bag, I had to wean them off and send them all to doggie rehab for a serious jerky treat addiction....
customer_reviews.author: LockedforEditing

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I have three dogs and they love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have three dogs and they love these treats! These are the perfect treats for training because they tear so easily, and you can make several pieces off one piece of jerky. This is another awesome product by Blue Diamond!
customer_reviews.author: John Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great company and puppy appreciated!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy Ducky absolutely loves these! She has tiny puppy teeth so I tear them into pieces for her, but she can't get enough of them. They are great as a training treat, she's learned sit within minutes thanks to these. I will note though, they make her gassy. It could be her breed, or maybe these aren't formulated for puppies I don't know to be honest. I will be buying these again though.
customer_reviews.author: katie campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, My Dog Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes these Blue Buffalo Blue Stix Lamb & Apples dog treats. I have had to take my dog off all grain dog treats and food because of skin problems. When my dog first smelled these treats I knew she would like them, it was like hurry up.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves these however the labeling is misleading. ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves these however the labeling is misleading...there is 300 mg of glucosamine per BAG not per piece. So if they average 12 pcs to a bag, there is only 25 mg per pc. Disappointing but dog still loves them. I called the comoany to verify.
customer_reviews.author: Paia

customer_reviews.title: WOOF BUY AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: MY DOG LOVES THESE. My dog is 25lbs. We ended up breaking these into smaller sticks for these to last longer. VERY GOOD for the dog and he loves them! I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Redkiss

customer_reviews.title: Super for healthy dogs
customer_reviews.text: All of the Blue buffalo stuff is the best. I was recommended these by someone who works at an animal shelter/adoption center and have never turned back dogs love them and its healthy for them too
customer_reviews.author: talonmedic

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: Great treats for your pup especially if your training because you can break them into sizes you want.
customer_reviews.author: NKnick

customer_reviews.title: ... course these are from Blue so they are of good quality. Not the best item I have purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Of course these are from Blue so they are of good quality. Not the best item I have purchased from them. I didn't order anymore. I order Blue Wilderness Trail Treats in Chicken Jerky. 3 ingredients 1.Chicken, 2. Dried Cane Molasses and 3. Salt. My dog loves those. She is 9 pounds & 10 yrs old, in case that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lulugirl

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these - more than most other treats (he is picky about his regular food, not as picky about treats). I like that they are better for him than a lot of other options. We also use these to put into his Kong toys - he is willing to keep working at the Kong until he gets these out (some other treats he will give up on)
customer_reviews.author: TJB016

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVED these. My big boy would try to get the bag so I had to store them high enough so he couldn't reach them!!
customer_reviews.author: mjc

customer_reviews.title: Great for our old dog!
customer_reviews.text: These Jolly Joints treats are wonderful for our old dachshund (13yr), she also gets bladder stones and I like that this particular product only has a few ingredients in it so that we know it's not going to contribute to more stones. We cut the jerky treat in half and but one half in a small Kong and it takes her a while to get it out which also gives her an activity and keeps her busy. We love this combo and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: no tummy trouble!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love these! I store them in an air tight jar, so they stay nice and soft. These are probably their favorite treats. Ingredients are quality, and have given no digestive issues whatsoever to my sensitive tummy pup. Ill definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly dry & hard
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these. We use them to deliver her two daily pills. Unfortunately, our recent orders have not been fresh. I'm not saying they were expired, I'm saying that they were dry, hard & inflexible, so we were unable to stuff her pills inside without the sticks bursting their sides. We've gone back to buying them at our local pet store, which is an inconvenience & disappointment. I guess Amazon's inventory doesn't turn as fast as the pet store's.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: although he doesn't have a super picky palate
customer_reviews.text: My dog gobbled these treats right up, although he doesn't have a super picky palate. :) I like that they are made with real ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: carly smith

customer_reviews.title: my min pin loves these treats and we buy on a regular basis. they are soft and small and perfect for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: my min pin loves these treats and we buy on a regular basis. they are soft and small and perfect for small dogs. they are mad ei the usa and don't have extra chemicals or by-products like other treats that can be harmful for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treats
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my dog's favorite treats. They are about 5 inches long, but easy to snap into smaller pieces. They feel slightly greasy and don't smell very good. If you leave the bag open, they can get hard. But they are a good snack for my dog to chew on and it keeps him busy for a few minutes if I give him a larger piece.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Cortez Jr.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo Rules in Pet Food
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Our 5 month old Maltese baby girl devoured the first stick out of the bag, and hasn't slowed down since. We love them because they're very healthy and safe for her. They smell so good you might even want to take a bite before giving it to your doggie :-0. We've tried several Blue Buffalo items and had success with all. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved!
customer_reviews.text: The Blue Buffalo Jolly Joints (Chicken Jerky Dog Treats) are a hit with our mixed lab. He is 50 pounds and sometimes gets picky about his treats. They are the perfect size for him, not too short and not to long. He likes them a lot and they are healthy for him. We will buy them again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Soft chewy, grain-free treat easy to tear in smaller bits.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my Yorkie has allergies but needed a good, grain free trial. They are a semi-soft stick that is easy to tear in half for smaller dogs. My Little girl loves them and is excited when I start opening the bag to give her one! :)
customer_reviews.author: Yorkiemom

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this treat! What I like about it is that I can break off small pieces and use it as a training treat for her. It doesn't have a real strong odor so I can carry it in my pocket when I walk her.
customer_reviews.author: Abbigold

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo jerky
customer_reviews.text: My standard poodle got these and she liked ok- but seemed to have some tummy issues afterwards- so I only purchased once. I should maybe try once again and will update my review then- because in all fairness- it could have been anything else
customer_reviews.author: Madelaine

customer_reviews.title: Blue Jolly Joints
customer_reviews.text: I can't say too much good about this Blue Buffalo product doesn't agree with my dog. I am a Blue Buffalo customer and never had a problem with there dog food.
customer_reviews.author: pp1951

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: After all the chicken treat recalls I have been weary about giving any chicken treats to my dog but Blue Buffalo is very clear about their product and chicken being made in the USA. My dog is only 16 pounds but I break the pieces in half so the bag will last longer and it's easier for him to parade it around the house. He looks forward to his daily chicken treat
customer_reviews.author: SOPHIA H

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the best dog treats I've found
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best dog treats I've found. They're easy to break into small pieces, they don't get sticky or fall apart when you handle them, they don't smell strongly, and my dog absolutely loves them. Will definitely be a repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Butler

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: Nice & firm but still soft. They don't break up in the bag like other brands I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: nas6car

customer_reviews.title: I was trying to get him off the stuff he loves that's not great for him (Pupperoni and Beggin' Strips) to see it ...
customer_reviews.text: My cockapoo LOVES these. I was trying to get him off the stuff he loves that's not great for him (Pupperoni and Beggin' Strips) to see it would help with allergies. Alas, it has not BUT he loves these and the Lamb and Apple (possibly because these look like Pupperoni but without the gag-inducing chemically fake meat smell (Now made with probable carcinogens YOUR dog will love!)
customer_reviews.author: Embiggenedsoul

customer_reviews.title: Puppy approved
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quality seems good. Got here quickly. As advertised. My dog loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Tangled

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if the glucosamine and chondroitin in these would have done as well alone. (I bought another supplement as well) but the fact is knowing I was giving my dog something that was helping him is good feeling.
customer_reviews.author: JONI

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for your pet.
customer_reviews.text: I have a little dog that can detect a pill inanything I give her. She has a very limited diet due to allergies and this product is great. Not only does she like these and they are very healthy for her. And, you can easily slide a pill in it and she just gobbles it up
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: One brand.
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dog only Blue Buffalo treats and food. When I got him from a shelter four years ago his skin was red with allergies. He still has allergies, but the Blue Buffalo food helps minimize the scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jessup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog will do ANYTHING to get these treats. I think they're laced with crack :)
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sugar
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog to help with stiff joints because he is getting older. He loves them, but the vet pointed out that they have way too much sugar and should only be given to him as an occasional treat
customer_reviews.author: Becca RSO

customer_reviews.title: great for high value puppy treats while training.
customer_reviews.text: I love the price, but I refuse to tell you how they taste since they're not for me... the dogs go nuts when I go for the bag of these treats. they break apart easy for a good high value treat for training my puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Senarighi

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients, recommend
customer_reviews.text: My very picky dog loooooves these. She's a small dog (5lbs) and it takes her a couple of minutes to finish a stick. Sometimes I break up a stick into smaller pieces for small bite-sized treats instead of one large treat. Great ingredients, recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ZumaLun

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these lights! They arrived very quickly and they were a breeze to put up. I actually didn't even screw them in because they stuck on so well. They are a great asset to my kitchen. I love the remote and the dimmer as well! Great buy! I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: SMT

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Snack That's Good For Them
customer_reviews.text: My little mini schnauzers love them! It's a treat I feel good about giving them. I have noticed a signification improvement in their energy and overall health since I switched them to Blue products. Yes, it's more expensive, but my dogs have been faithful, wonderful companions to me and my family. I want them to be healthy and happy!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Moran

customer_reviews.title: A tasty and useful treat
customer_reviews.text: My goldendoodle puppy loves these. I like that I can break them into small pieces to use during training. I can also break to sticks in half and place them inside the little sumo chew toy which occupies her time when we leave her home alone.
customer_reviews.author: N. Van

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: Having a softer treat is a nice change from all the hard dental products.
customer_reviews.author: JMW 0907

customer_reviews.title: dogs love it but beware
customer_reviews.text: my two little guys love these treats. but need to beware when they try to eat in a hurry sometimes they find themselves choking on them. I have seen on a few occasions now that they cough them back up to chew again a bit more so they can swallow! now I cut them up into smaller pieces and feed it to them slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Pro

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Just purchased these & the expiration date is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Just purchased these & the expiration date is in September! The dogs do like the treats & I like them for training.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle GamblinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They smell great, human quality
customer_reviews.text: They smell great, human quality, probably better than slim jim. However... not sure how healthy since it seems pretty darn processed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Xavier

customer_reviews.title: I have a 8lb Yorkipoo. She has a tendency ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 8lb Yorkipoo. She has a tendency to hide treats away for later, rather than devour them entirely right when given to her. These treats, however, are different. She pounces on them and they disappear in the blink of an eye. ...And then she spends the next few hours following me around with beggy eyes trying to get more. I'd say she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaci L

customer_reviews.title: My husky lab goes kookoo for these "stix" streets by ...
customer_reviews.text: My husky lab goes kookoo for these "stix" streets by Blue buffalo. We normally give the beef bits and save the "stix" for when we need her to really listen. We trust the ingredients of the Blue brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten M.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these things
customer_reviews.text: They're kind of expensive, but I know they're healthy for him because they are a Blue Buffalo product. I give him a stick at night at bed time. He perks up when he notices me going through the "get ready for bed" routine because he knows he's getting one of these treats. I highly recommend these things if you can afford them. Your dog will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog says 5 stars for these.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. He's sensitive to chicken, so treats that don't have it are hard to find. The best part is that they are scored, so it's easy to break them into smaller treats if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Zona lady

customer_reviews.title: Well liked by my little dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 littles and they really love these. We use them for crate praise. Their eyes just light up when they see the bag come out!
customer_reviews.author: kneadnprayer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats... There are ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats... There are so many options for flavors too so we try to change it up a lot. Her mouth starts drooling when she sees these!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: so these salmon goodies are a great solution. I have a small Shih Tzu
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard to find healthy treats - so many dogs are allergic to chicken and/or beef, so these salmon goodies are a great solution. I have a small Shih Tzu, so I like that I an easily break a small piece off of the sticks.
customer_reviews.author: SallyC

customer_reviews.title: Healthy delicious treat for pups!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 lb jack-chi is obsessed with these treats. I give her half at a time. A full stick has 28.5 calories each. They smell very meaty and are soft chew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally grain-free treats that don't cost a fortune!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is sensitive to grain in her diet, and finding affordable grain-free treats has been a challenge. She absolutely LOVES this product. The stix are soft enough to break into small pieces, which is perfect for a 9 lb. dog. One bag goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: KDH

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater loves these.
customer_reviews.text: The dog is picky with his treats, particularly eschewing dry biscuits. These, he loved. The dog loves anything salmon but especially snacks that are soft and smell good.
customer_reviews.author: PoohkieBear

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 dogs have diet restrictions due to allergies and diabetes. These treats meet their diet restrictions and they love them, plus we feel good about the blue buffalo brand and products being made in the USA. You can't beat the price, for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rolyat0424

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very good quality. I buy this brand all the time and I am very picky about what my dogs eat.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Graser Hamric

customer_reviews.title: Natural soft treats.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, and I feel good giving her a treat that is natural. These replaced pupperoni at our house. They can be broken for small training treats. I can't review much past there because I haven't tasted them personally, and my dog can't type.
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Dog seems to love them. I break them up into smaller chunks, which he probably doesn't love, but they last longer. They are soft, kind of like a slim-jim.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: They're segmented for easy tear apart and every dog I've ever offered them ...
customer_reviews.text: These have been fabulous for training my border collie mix. They're segmented for easy tear apart and every dog I've ever offered them to looooves them.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca FioreTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love them, yum yum
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy loves these and they do not tend to cause him any digestive trouble. I usually break them into smaller pieces for training. We will definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: shortcake

customer_reviews.title: Great training treats
customer_reviews.text: Dog LOVES these. They are great because you can break them into smaller pieces (they are long sticks with marks to break them up into like 5 pieces per stick). I use them as training treats.
customer_reviews.author: KathyP

customer_reviews.title: i have a 15 yr old and her stomach is super sensitive, these do not bother her one bit ...
customer_reviews.text: these are my pups favs!!! i have a 15 yr old and her stomach is super sensitive, these do not bother her one bit and she loves them... the price is much better here than in petco or petsmart
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Dog Treat's for a Healthy Life
customer_reviews.text: If you would like to keep you Dog here a lot longer, please give them BLUE-STIX Products, For a Healthier Choice of Life
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: My dog really loves these treats and he's pretty picky. They're just so expensive so I appreciate ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog really loves these treats and he's pretty picky. They're just so expensive so I appreciate that you have them and they are more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats and they are great for training
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats and they are great for training. I bought half a dozen packs as they are a full $2.00 per pack cheaper than I have found ANYWHERE! I will definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOGS WILL LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are obsessed!!! They've never been treat-driven because they don't have any treats they go nuts over. This was THE treat though! They love them and beg for them.
customer_reviews.author: Annika

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My little dogs love these and they're perfect for weight control but there are so few in a pack for the price. Still - I'll keep buying them because they like them and are not having digestive or skin issues like they were with other treats.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C

customer_reviews.title: Great product, too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about them but the price. There aren't that many in a package. They don't last long, even when my little dog-boys only each have a half of one each day. (There is no recommendation on the package for amount to give.) Getting older is rough, even for dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Dickman Family

customer_reviews.title: A great healthy treat for your pal.
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny dog and she goes nuts for Blu Stix. Since they are soft I can break it into many pieces and give to her as needed. I know she's eating a treat that is healthy for her and will keep her happy too. Fast shipment and no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: He's very picky about treats but these at his very favorite. I like that they are made in USA ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog absolutely loves these treats He does the "doggie dance" each day when it's time for his treat. He's very picky about treats but these at his very favorite. I like that they are made in USA so I have confidence in the ingredients. Though they are expensive they are worth it. I break the strip in half and feed him a half of strip morning and evening.
customer_reviews.author: Chopper Chic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rewards and training.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, was free shipping, right size for train and rewards. My dog loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Janice I.

customer_reviews.title: My dog has good taste
customer_reviews.text: My dog is over 16 years old and needs the supplements that are in these treats. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Pappaw 72

customer_reviews.title: A favorite for our picky pups
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 dogs in the house and 2 of them are very picky, but they will happily eat these. They don't seem to be hard on their tummies either like some of the other glucosamine treats have been.
customer_reviews.author: ConverseBear

customer_reviews.title: A Very Healthy Option
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfectly healthy replacement for the cheap sticks I was giving my dog. The cheap ones had chemicals like propylene glycol. I would rather pay a little extra for real meat with no chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: My dog can't get enough of these things.
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit on the pricey side, but I can get that dog to do just about anything with these treats. It only took like a week to get him trained on getting his teeth brushed, and he's four years old. I use these things as a bed time treat, and anytime I want to train him to learn something new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great. She loves them
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs can only eat fish as a protein. These are great. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hubbard

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Stix Soft-Moist Dog Treats
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Beef| Size:6 ozWe love our dogs and cats like family so we want to feed them with the same care as family. That's why BLUE is made with only the finest natural ingredients.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
BLUE Stix are moist and meaty rolls of pure joy for all treat-loving canines. The perfect reward for good behavior, or just for being a loyal friend, BLUE Stix have a taste that dogs can’t resist. And BLUE Stix don’t just taste great, they are fortified with natural ingredients that help provide specific health benefits. Contains: Glucosamine & Chondroitin - To help promote healthy joints, Taurine - To help support heart health, and Vitamins A, C and E - To help support the immune system
feature_bullets: Taurine To Support Heart Health And Vitamins A, C & E To Help Support The Immune System
Glucosamine And Chondroitin To Help Promote Healthy Joints
No Chicken Or Poultry By-Product Meals, Packaging May Vary.
